review_title: A wonderful organization doing orthopedic surgeries for needy children in 7 countries
job_title: General Laborer in Grand Haven, MI
pros: CURE is a group of committed people. As an employer, they are flexible, pay their people well, and respect one another.
cons: CURE has gone through some reorganization, and that can be turbulent.
